transArray.content: The room is clean and the service attitude is very good. The breakfast is a buffet, which is delicious. The hotel is close to the subway station, which is very convenient.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room attendants and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides great convenience for guests to eat, live, travel, entertain and shop. The hotel is located at Gate 2 east of Badili Auto Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station Exit A. It is a 3-5 minute walk. You can reach the hotel directly in minutes. We look forward to meeting you again. I wish you a happy life. General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
